string.name: name
string.value: In Search for the Lost Memory

According to the Memory Keeper, in order to find my lost memory, I need to go back to the starting point of my adventure. Starting point of my adventure? Let's see... Wouldn't that be when I left Maple Island to Victoria Island for the first time and got my job? I should go see #b#p1090000##k.

It had been a long time since I last met with #p1090000#. He said he remembered back when I was just a beginning and I knew nothing. He was happy to see how I've grown into a great pirate. I was touched that he still remembered our first meeting from such a long time ago.
